subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury disappeared again Monday afternoon, not because of an aversion to his coach, but because of a much stronger impulse: to avoid television cameras, microphones and notepads.
snippet: Stephon Marbury disappeared again Monday afternoon, not because of an aversion to his coach, but because of a much stronger impulse: to avoid television cameras, microphones and notepads.
